original_title: Sakvithi Ranasinghe and wife plead guilty to fraud charges
original_body_lines: Sakvithi Ranasinghe and his wife, who were accused of maintaining an unauthorized financial institution and misusing the deposits worth over Rs. 164 million obtained from the public, have pleaded guilty to the financial fraud charges.
The revised charge sheet submitted by the Attorney General was read out when the couple was produced before Colombo High Court Judge Aditya Patabendi this morning (July 19).
